privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: GDPR Compliant & Vietnam Data Protection Law

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content:
TheWhite is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) and Vietnamese law.

This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when using TheWhite's website and services.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content:
**Information you provide:**
‚Ä¢ Name, email address, phone number
‚Ä¢ Shipping and billing address
‚Ä¢ Account information (username, encrypted password)
‚Ä¢ Order information and purchase history
‚Ä¢ Feedback, product reviews

**Information automatically collected:**
‚Ä¢ IP address, browser type, operating system
‚Ä¢ Cookies and similar tracking technologies
‚Ä¢ Website usage data (pages viewed, access time)
‚Ä¢ Analytics data from Google Analytics

**Legal basis:**
‚Ä¢ Performance of a sales contract
‚Ä¢ Legitimate business interests
‚Ä¢ Your consent

usage.title: 3. Purpose of Data Usage
usage.content:
We use your data to:

‚úì Process and deliver orders
‚úì Send order confirmations and shipping updates
‚úì Provide customer service
‚úì Process payments (via secure payment partners)
‚úì Improve user experience and personalize content
‚úì Send promotional information (only with your consent)
‚úì Analyze and research the market
‚úì Detect and prevent fraud
‚úì Comply with legal obligations

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content:
**Security measures:**
‚Ä¢ SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
‚Ä¢ Password storage hashed with bcrypt
‚Ä¢ Firewall and intrusion detection systems
‚Ä¢ Role-based access control
‚Ä¢ Periodic data backup and encryption
‚Ä¢ Employee training on information security

**Retention period:**
‚Ä¢ Account data: Until you request deletion
‚Ä¢ Order data: 5 years (accounting legal requirement)
‚Ä¢ Marketing data: 2 years or until opt-out
‚Ä¢ Cookies: Varies (session or 1-12 months)

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.content:
We only share data with trusted third parties:

**Service partners:**
‚Ä¢ Shipping units (Giao H√†ng Nhanh, Viettel Post)
‚Ä¢ Payment gateways (VNPay, MoMo - PCI DSS compliant)
‚Ä¢ Email marketing services (only with your consent)
‚Ä¢ Google Analytics (anonymized data)

**Legal requirements:**
‚Ä¢ When ordered by competent authorities
‚Ä¢ To protect the rights and safety of TheWhite and customers

We do **NOT** sell or rent your personal data.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.content:
You have the following rights:

**Right of access:** Request a copy of your personal data

**Right to rectification:** Update inaccurate information

**Right to erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"):** Request deletion of your data

**Right to restrict processing:** Pause data processing in specific cases

**Right to data portability:** Receive data in a readable format

**Right to object:** Refuse data processing for marketing purposes

**Right to withdraw consent:** Cancel consent given at any time

**How to exercise rights:**
üìß Email: privacy@thewhite.vn
üìû Hotline: 0123 456 789
‚è±Ô∏è Response time: 30 days

international.title: 7. International Data Transfer
international.content:
Some of our partners may be located overseas (e.g., AWS servers in Singapore). We ensure all data transfers comply with GDPR through:

‚Ä¢ Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) approved by the EU
‚Ä¢ Partners certified with ISO 27001
‚Ä¢ Full data protection agreements

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our website is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you are a parent and discover your child has provided information, please contact us immediately to delete the data.

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.content:
We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be notified via:

‚Ä¢ Email to registered address
‚Ä¢ Prominent notice on the website
‚Ä¢ Popup notice upon login

Continued use of the service after changes implies acceptance of the new policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact - Data Protection Officer
contact.description: If you have any questions about the privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO):
contact.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent Data Protection Authority if you believe your rights have been violated.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing and using TheWhite website (www.thewhite.vn), you agree to comply with these terms and conditions of use.

If you do not agree to any part of the terms, please do not use our services.

We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

account.title: 2. User Account
account.content:
**Account Registration:**
‚Ä¢ You must be 16 years or older to create an account
‚Ä¢ Registration information must be accurate and complete
‚Ä¢ You are responsible for securing your account and password
‚Ä¢ You must notify immediately if unauthorized access is detected

**Our Rights:**
‚Ä¢ Refuse or cancel registration without reason
‚Ä¢ Suspend/delete accounts violating terms
‚Ä¢ Request additional identity verification

**Your Obligations:**
‚Ä¢ Do not share account with others
‚Ä¢ Do not use for unauthorized commercial purposes
‚Ä¢ Do not create multiple accounts to abuse promotions

orders.title: 3. Orders & Payment
orders.content:
**Ordering Process:**
1. Select products and add to cart
2. Fill in shipping and payment information
3. Confirm order and pay
4. Receive order confirmation email

**Pricing & Payment:**
‚Ä¢ Prices displayed in VND, including VAT
‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to change prices at any time
‚Ä¢ Methods: COD, bank transfer, credit card, e-wallet
‚Ä¢ Orders are processed only after successful payment

**Order Cancellation:**
‚Ä¢ You can cancel before the order is handed to shipping
‚Ä¢ Refund in 5-7 working days (if paid)
‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to cancel orders if fraud is detected

shipping.title: 4. Shipping & Delivery
shipping.content:
**Delivery Area:**
‚Ä¢ Nationwide via reputable shipping partners
‚Ä¢ Time: 2-5 days (inner city), 3-7 days (remote provinces)
‚Ä¢ Shipping fee: According to current policy

**Liability:**
‚Ä¢ We are not liable for delays caused by shipping partners
‚Ä¢ You must check goods before accepting (for COD)
‚Ä¢ Complaints must be sent within 24h of receipt

**Risk:**
‚Ä¢ Risk transfers to you upon successful delivery
‚Ä¢ You are responsible for providing accurate address

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content:
**Copyright:**
‚Ä¢ All content on the website (text, images, logo, video) belongs to TheWhite
‚Ä¢ "TheWhite" logo is a registered trademark
‚Ä¢ Website design is protected by copyright law

**Usage Limits:**
‚Ä¢ You may view and download for personal purpose
‚Ä¢ Must not copy, distribute, or use commercially
‚Ä¢ Must not create derivative works

**Violation:**
‚Ä¢ We will take legal action if copyright infringement is detected

liability.title: 6. Liability & Limitations
liability.content:
**Disclaimer:**
‚Ä¢ Website provided "as-is"
‚Ä¢ We do not guarantee continuous website operation
‚Ä¢ Not liable for technical errors, viruses, malware

**Limitation of Liability:**
‚Ä¢ We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
‚Ä¢ Maximum liability: Value of related order
‚Ä¢ Not applicable for damages due to gross negligence

**Indemnification:**
‚Ä¢ You agree to indemnify TheWhite if violating terms causes damage

**Force Majeure:**
‚Ä¢ We are not liable for events beyond control (natural disasters, war, epidemics)

prohibited.title: 7. Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.content:
When using the service, you MUST NOT:
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Violate Vietnamese or international laws
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Use for fraud, money laundering
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Upload viruses, malware or malicious code
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Attempt unauthorized access to the system
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Collect other users' information
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Impersonate TheWhite or our employees
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Spam, harass, or annoying behavior
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Use bots, automated scripts to buy goods
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Post content violating copyright
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Exploit system errors for profit

links.title: 8. Third Party Links
links.content:
The website may contain links to third-party websites. We do not control and are not responsible for the content, privacy policy, or practices of these sites.

Accessing external links is at your own risk. We encourage you to read carefully the terms and privacy policy of every website you visit.

dispute.title: 9. Dispute Resolution
dispute.content:
**Governing Law:** These terms follow Vietnamese law.
**Negotiation:** Disputes must be resolved through negotiation first.
**Court:** If negotiation fails, disputes will be resolved at the competent Court in Ho Chi Minh City.
**Language:** The Vietnamese version of these terms is the official version. In case of conflict with other language versions, the Vietnamese version prevails.

severability.title: 10. Severability
severability.content:
If any provision in this document is determined to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain in full force.

Our failure to enforce any right is not considered a waiver of that right.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms, please contact:

agreement.label: Important:
agreement.content: By using TheWhite website, you confirm that you have read, understood and agree to comply with all terms and conditions stated above.
